column4: applications are hanging so much these days. especially firefox and media players. what's the problem? what do i do?
gnome firefox and vlc and mplayer
i need to install more memory?
that works so, but is very unconvienent, other specs of that pc ?
yes, that works, but you mussn't have to many apps running in the same time, also vm's won't work well, see top and htop, when system is laggy
